title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When datetime values are retrieved from a table and displayed in a dynamic text item or a data/text item, they are shown in different formats.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a text, data, or dynamic text item.
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in the item.
